exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.content:
1. **Fill in the blanks:**

(a) A device that is used to break an electric circuit is called _______________.

(b) An electric cell has _______________ terminals.

exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.content:
2. **Mark 'True' or 'False' for the following statements:**

(a) Electric current can flow through metals.

(b) Instead of metal wires, a jute string can be used to make a circuit.

(c) Electric current can pass through a sheet of thermo Col.

exercises.content: 8. **Using the 'conduction tester' on an object it was found that the bulb begins to glow. Is that object a conductor or an insulator? Explain.**

exercises.content: 9. **Why should an electrician use rubber gloves while repairing an electric switch at your home? Explain.**
